titleStmt.title: The true copy of a petition, delivered to the Right Honorable the Lord Major, aldermen, and Commons of the City of London, in Common-Councell assembled, on Tuesday the 23 of June, 1646. To the Right Honourable the Lord Major, the Right Worshipfull the Aldermen and Commons of the city of London, in Common-Councell assembled.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Cotes, Printer to the Honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Against the Independents, in favour of church union with the Scotch, etc.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
